Annotation Interface View

    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    View.FocusPolicy
    focusPolicy
    When this View is brought into focus, what should happen to the rest
    int
    layer
    Render ordering, a higher value is more in the background, a layer of -1 is the top, initially user-facing view.

  • Element Details

    • layer

      int layer
      Render ordering, a higher value is more in the background, a layer of -1 is the top, initially user-facing view. 
           
     @View( layer = 1 )
     public class SomeView { ... }
      Default:
      0

    • focusPolicy

      View.FocusPolicy focusPolicy
      When this View is brought into focus, what should happen to the rest
      Default:
      OPAQUE
